results.title: Establishing new plants
results.creator_credit: Ivo Burum, ABC-TV (Australia) and Victorian College of Agriculture and Horticulture
results.brief_description:
Episode number 9 of Series “Growing awareness: Factors in plant production”.
Discusses how sexual reproduction, plant propagation and factors affecting plant growth are vital in establishing new plants for commercial production. Dormancy, the means by which a seed may survive in conditions where a plant may not, and different methods of seed scarification used to commence germination are also examined. Highlights methods of propagation including obtaining cuttings, grafting, budding and the use of rootstock.

results.title: Essential interview skills: teachers guide (MS)
results.brief_description: This teacher’s guide is designed to accompany the short video, ‘Essential interview skills’, produced to help young people who are preparing for work and/or tertiary entrance. It addresses many common questions such as “What are prospective employers looking for?” and features discussions with employers and universities. The video can be used in a variety of classroom situations such as VET, SOSE, Industry, Enterprise and Technology design studies, home groups, study skills seminar or work experience preparation seminars.

results.title: Essence of life
results.brief_description: Explains and illustrates the main characteristics of a living organism - the ability to reproduce its own species, response to stimuli, movement and metabolism. Studies different forms of life developed on earth as conditions altered, from fresh water to dry land - fish, amphibia, birds, insects, animals and plants.

results.title: ESPN Super bouts. Vol. 12
results.brief_description: Features the rematch between Marvin Hagler, existing Middleweight championship holder and Vito Antuofermo with whom he drew in 1979 when Antuofermo was reigning champion. The action is picked up in round 2, live from The Boston Garden, Boston, Massachusetts, June 13, 1981 where Hagler is victorious. Also features a bout at The Rosemont Horizon, Rosemont, Illinois, October 10, 1981, where Hagler beats Mustaffa Hamsho in a TKO. Includes a match debrief by Al Bernstein and Sam Smith.

results.title: ESPN Super bouts. Vol. 11
results.brief_description: Features the 1979 World Middleweight Championship bout between Marvellous Marvin Hagler and defending champion Vito Antuofermo at Ceasar’s Palace, Las Vegas, Nevada, November 1979. It was a case of Hagler’s strength against the heart of mauler and brawler Antuofermo. The bout resulted in a 15 round draw. Includes a match debrief by Al Bernstein and Sam Smith.

results.title: Especially the children
results.brief_description: In the developing world, simple survival is the basic need for many children and their families. UNICEF seeks for all children the basic rights and privileges set forth in the Declaration of the Rights of the Child.

results.title: Eskimo children
results.creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and ERPI Classroom Films
results.brief_description: A study of an Eskimo family living on Nunivak Island, off the Alaskan coast, showing how the Eskimo people solve the problem of providing food, clothing, shelter, and transport for themselves. Today the results of the contacts made with the outside world can be seen in the changing customs of the Eskimo people.

results.title: Escape from the sea
results.creator_credit: Peter Seabourne, A. Frank Bundy and Wallace Productions
results.brief_description: A film designed for a youthful audience depicting the adventures of a boy about 12 years old who gets into difficulty in the sea in his rubber dingy. He is rescued by a scouting group who then have problems when their leader is hit by falling rocks. He in turn is rescued by helicopter. Filmed on the foreshores of Cornwall this is a “safety” film showing the work of the Royal Naval Rescue Service and HM Coastguard.
